title: President Trump Announces Presidential Delegation to Attend the Inauguration of His Excellency Roch Marc Christian Kaboré, President of Burkina Faso – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
December 27, 2020
President Donald J. Trump today announced the designation of a Presidential Delegation to attend the Inauguration of His Excellency Roch Marc Christian Kaboré, President of Burkina Faso, on Monday, December 28, 2020, in Ouagadougou, Burkina Faso.The Honorable Dr. J. Peter Pham, Ph.D., United States Special Envoy for the Sahel Region of Africa, will lead the delegation.Member of the Presidential Delegation: 
The Honorable Sandra E. Clark, United States Ambassador to Burkina Faso
